ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: I should feal lucky the pred didn t follow you. I ve been panting for a shot at one. Lunarpine s voice showed excitement, not fear, If I would ve scrapped

"I should feal lucky the pred didn't follow you. I've been panting 
for a shot at one." Lunarpine's voice showed excitement, not fear," 
If I would've scrapped him then I'd owe you another favor."

"What's your hurry to get back to base, seems to me I still owe you 
dinner.I smelled some kind of herd on the way up how about we see if 
it's still there?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> 
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She knew her spark was her strength and her weakness at the same 
time.
> "I have to admit that I am not a warrior. As much as I want to be 
> one, it is beyond my capablilties."  She sighed and hung her 
> shoulders and head down. "I'm sorry for everthing that I did. I 
never 
> meant to get anyone in trouble.  I didn't mean for you to come out 
> here and risk your life for me.  Even if that Pred had come back, I 
> wouldn't want you to get in harms way for me. I'm not worth it."
> 
> She checked her internal systems and found her wing had healed 
> itself.  She transformed into her owl mode. "I can fly again. I wil 
> follow you back to the base." she said in a low, soft voice. She 
felt 
> like she made another mistake and was about o make another one by 
> following him back to the base.  But part of her spark told her to 
> follow Lunarpine back to the base.
